answers.answer: Im going monday find.out what to eat what not to eat
Do y'all have to poke yall self daily

2200 calorie diet, 30 grams of carbs at breakfast, 60 at lunch and 60 at dinner. A snack after each checkof my blood sugar. Snacks can't be any more than 30g of carbs. I check my blood sugar first thing in the morning, and two hours after each meal so 4 times a day. If your tests come back positive that you have gd they will send you to a dietician who will explain what you're allowed to have and how much you can have.
Does Medicaid pay for the machine to check sugar?
You would have to check with them. It's different for other places. I have Medicaid as a secondary insurance so mine was completely covered between my insurance through work and them.
